column4: Hello and pardon me, I just got ubuntu recently on my computer, and it won't run a lot of installation disks I have for things.  Could someone be so kind as to help me rectify this?

Im guessing you just came from Windows?  If so, your install disks wont work on Ubuntu unless you run some other special software called WINE....and even then, you might still not be able to.  Linux is entirely different than Windows, like a Mac is.
Where can I find the software for that?
